tests.test_worderly module

tests.test_worderly.sample_settings() → dict[source]

Provide a basic settings dictionary for tests.

Returns:

A dictionary with sample settings.

Return type:

dict

tests.test_worderly.test_get_lexicon_file_no_arg(mock_print: object) → None[source]

Test get_lexicon_file when no filename argument is provided.

Ensure function returns None and prints error messages.

tests.test_worderly.test_get_lexicon_file_read_fail(mock_print: object, mock_read: object) → None[source]

Test get_lexicon_file when read_word_file fails.

Ensure function returns None and prints error messages.

tests.test_worderly.test_get_lexicon_file_success(mock_print: object, mock_read: object) → None[source]

Test get_lexicon_file successful execution.

Ensure function returns the lexicon path and does not print errors.

tests.test_worderly.test_main_exits_if_no_lexicon(mock_run_menu: object, mock_get_lex: object) → None[source]

Test that main returns if get_lexicon_file returns None.

Ensure main does not proceed to run_heart_points_menu.

Module contents

Test package for Worderly.

This package contains unit tests for the core gameplay logic, state management, powerup handling, grid setup, leaderboard, and related components.

Modules:

gameplay: Tests for the main gameplay loop, state handler, and powerup logic. leaderboard: Tests for leaderboard and streak management. setup: Tests for setup logic, grid generation, menus, and word selection.
